data.comment: Today's referee, Craig Pawson, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, At Anfield, Arsenal are penalized for being offside.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 2, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Sadio Mane (Liverpool) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 6, Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Arsenal's Ainsley Maitland-Niles is whistled for offside at Anfield.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 13, In Liverpool, Naby Keita of Liverpool is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, Arsenal have a goal kick.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane gets in a shot on goal at Anfield. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 18, Craig Pawson signals a Liverpool throw-in in Arsenal's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 20, Craig Pawson signals a Liverpool throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 21, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In Liverpool Liverpool drive forward through Mohamed Salah. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Arsenal's area.
In the minute 23, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Georginio Wijnaldum gets his shot on target but fails to score for Liverpool.
In the minute 25, Alexandre Lacazette puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Arsenal drive forward but Alexandre Lacazette is judged offside.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 28, Sadio Mane levels the score at 1-1.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Arsenal at Anfield.
Craig Pawson awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Liverpool pushes forward through Naby Keita, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andrew Robertson is on target to give Liverpool a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 34, That's a fine assist from Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Liverpool are pushing forward but Trent Alexander-Arnold's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Arsenal.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 40, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Throw-in Arsenal.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Craig Pawson blows against Arsenal's Willian for offside.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 45, Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Liverpool's Sadio Mane gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 47, Craig Pawson awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 49, Arsenal's Ainsley Maitland-Niles gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Liverpool defender.
Trent Alexander-Arnold for Liverpool has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Anfield.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 51, Craig Pawson signals a Liverpool throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Arsenal needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Arsenal drives forward and Alexandre Lacazette gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Dani Ceballos is on a sub for Granit Xhaka for Arsenal.
In the minute 61, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Virgil van Dijk for Liverpool drives towards goal at Anfield. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Alexandre Lacazette of Arsenal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Sadio Mane for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 68, Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Arsenal make their second substitution with Nicolas Pepe replacing Willian.
Naby Keita (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 69, Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Throw-in Liverpool.
In the minute 72, Arsenal will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Liverpool.
Dani Ceballos (Arsenal) has received a yellow card from Craig Pawson.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 74, Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a third substitution, with Edward Nketiah replacing Alexandre Lacazette.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Important block from the Arsenal defence as Roberto Firmino fires in a strike for Liverpool.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 78, Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in Liverpool.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Naby Keita with James Milner. This is the first substitution made today by Jurgen Klopp.
In the minute 80, Diogo Jota is replacing Sadio Mane for the home team.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Anfield.
Liverpool are coming forward and Diogo Jota gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Arsenal.
Diogo Jota of Liverpool gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
David Luiz of Arsenal is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 88, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Great finish from Diogo Jota to give Liverpool a 3-1 lead.
Liverpool are pushing forward but Trent Alexander-Arnold's finish is wide of the goal.
Craig Pawson awards Arsenal a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Liverpool.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team replace Roberto Firmino with Takumi Minamino.
